item.title: A really simple working compiler
item.dc:creator: @johno2 johno2
item.description:
@johno2 wrote:

Here is a very simple compiler which hasn’t failed on me yet!

@echo off
echo johno’s simple complier
“C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_07\bin\javac.exe” *.java
java -Xmx512m -cp .;./jython.jar;./MySql/mysql-connector-java-3.0.08-ga-bin.jar server
pause

u see “jdk1.6.0_07” just change to your jdk version by going C:\Program Files\Java

Read full topic
